Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 庽

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:寓

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5BD3

Main pronunciation 主要发音: yù

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning residence.

English senses 英语理解: residence; lodge; dwell

Usage example 用法举例: 公寓 gōng yù (apartment house)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 2133

Shuowen 说文解字: 寄也從宀禺聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 庽 older 寓 from (rem- 广 guǎng-yǎn-ān) from building 宀 mián and phonetic hand-holding-snake 禺 yú C709 寓<庽> simp 寓.

庽字的基本解释

庽
yù
同“寓”。

庽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》牛具切，去遇，疑。］
亦作“庽1”。“偶3”的被通假字。
(1)寄托。
(2)寄居。
(3)寓所。
(4)寄递。参见“寓書”。
(5)指寄居在树上的兽类。参见“寓屬”。
(6)模制的；替代的。参见“寓金銀”、“寓錢”。
(7)通“”。
(8)通“偶”。

庽字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庽； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页348第11
【廣韻】與寓同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" Niu has cut, met, doubted. ]
Also known as "庽1". "Even 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Sustenance.
(2) Sojourn.
(3) Residence.
(4) Delivery. See "Fable Book".
(5) Refers to beasts that live in trees. See "residence."
(6) Molded; alternative. See "Incorporating gold and silver", "Incorporating money".
(7) Pass "".
(8) Through "even".
